data.description:
Get inside the mines of doom, avoid the traps, discover powerful weapons and relics, fight against the beasts that infest the mines and against the factions who want to control them in this packed action roguelite!

In this roguelite inspired by classic RPGs you will control a character that will explore the mine of doom in Arizona, will fight against multiple enemy types, will level up, and will find ever more powerful items while you go deeper and deeper inside the mines.

* 4 classes: The Gunslinger, The Bank Robber, The Gold Seeker and the Saloon Girl
* 30+ weapon types including: revolvers, rifles, bows, crossbows, swords, maces, daggers, throwing weapons, two handed weapons, dual wielding weapons, explosives, and even flame throwers and machine guns!
* 20+ enemy types
* Endless fun, every game is diferent!

changelog.change_log:
PATCH NOTES

- Removed spread from Lever Rifle first shot and reduced max spread to 5ยบ.
- Fixed double-tap (signature skill), now should be a lot more responsive.
- Reduced angle required to enable ultimate skills, now you must point directly up before pressing the trigger, this allows you to shot tall enemies without triggering the ultimate skill accidentally.
- Using ultimate skills has priority over grabbing/releasing back weapons so you don't switch weapons accidentally when using ultimate skills.
- Added an indicator for quick access slots so you know where to grab to wield or release a wean.
- Reduced area to grab/release main hand weapon, now will be easier to shot to small enemies.

PATCH NOTES
- Removed spread from Lever Rifle first shot and reduced max spread to 5ยบ.
- Fixed double-tap (signature skill), now should be a lot more responsive.
- Reduced angle required to enable ultimate skills, now you must point directly up before pressing the trigger, this allows you to shot tall enemies without triggering the ultimate skill accidentally.
- Using ultimate skills has priority over grabbing/releasing back weapons so you don't switch weapons accidentally when using ultimate skills.
- Added an indicator for quick access slots so you know where to grab to wield or release a wean.
- Reduced area to grab/release main hand weapon, now will be easier to shot to small enemies.

NEW CLASSES ADDED
* The Bank Robber: stealthy character that can blow locks, avoid enemies, and find more loot!
* The Gold Seeker: melee specialist that can enrage to reduce the damage taken and obliterate his enemies.
* The Saloon Girl: spellcaster with inspiring songs, healing and crowd control spells.

NEW AREA
* The Caverns: infested with spiders from this world and from beyond.

REWORKED REST AREA
* You will be able to keep exploring the current level (same area type and difficulty).
* Sometime you will find a door to the mines, other to the caverns, and sometimes doors to booth areas.

NEW FEATURES
* Escape: if you don't attack or get attacked for 20s you escape from combat.
* Added a plain-text INGAME MANUAL, accessible from character selection and from the inventory book (marker H at the right bottom corner).
* Dual wielding: characters wielding two light weapons of the same time now spend a bonus action to execute and additional attack.
* Heritage: when you die your next character can spend all the money you had before entering the mines.
* Reset: now you can reset the seed to get a different map, traps, encounters and loot. This can be useful in desperate situations.

NEW ITEMS AND VENDORS
* Books: added some books that increase your experience allowing you to start at higher level up to 15th level.
* Added a second vendor before starting the game, this vendor will escalate with your best run! (e.g. you reached depth 30 the vendor will have loot for depth 30)

FIXES
* Lots of bug fixes!

Enjoy!
Fixed ramps and left hand controller management
